A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a shockingly bad film.  Disney's and Rian Johnson's treatment of Star Wars fans is reprehensible.  I'm hoping this trilogy is discarded and rebooted properly as soon as possible.  A real shame though - Disney had a chance to do something great with Mark Hamill\, Harrison Ford\, and Carrie Fisher\, but sadly we will never get to see it.
